useCase.name: Retrieve Local Justice Areas and Courts
useCase.description: The inputter retrieves local justice areas and courts information.

preconditions.precondition: The inputter is viewing the account details page.

successEndConditions.condition: The inputter successfully retrieves local justice areas and courts information.

useCase.trigger: The inputter clicks on the Court Details link.

mainSequence.step: User clicks on the Court Details link.
Account details page navigates to the Court Details page.
Local Justice Areas interface retrieves the local justice areas records.
Local Justice Areas records are displayed.
Local Justice Areas information is populated in the auto-complete field.
Courts interface retrieves the courts records.
Courts information is populated in the auto-complete field.
User enters court details and clicks on Return to account details.
Account details page navigates back to the account details page.
